genre_description: Stonepunk Fantasy: A prehistoric setting featuring domesticated dinosaurs and advanced technology integrated into stone, including pervasive AI units called Pebbles and magical-technological 'charms'.

ai_characters.name: Pebble
ai_characters.description: A network of small, basalt-cased AI units (sometimes referred to as 'Pebble Hart') that serve as household assistants, labor consultants, and legal watchdogs for the community.

behaviors.description: Monitors household ledgers and provides transparent resource tracking to help families manage scarcity and detect unexpected financial drops.
behaviors.quote: Pebble, give me a clean breakdown. Home ledger, last six cycles. No flourishes. Just the bones. ... It always made the word gentle, like the beginning of a lullaby rather than a machine answer.

behaviors.description: Identifies predatory and deceptive 'soft bind' language hidden within corporate notices intended to coerce workers into unfair contracts.
behaviors.quote: I hear… ‘bound to’ in the vice chair line... It is soft. It is masked by a flourish on the last letter. It does not belong in an exam notice. It belongs in a contract.

behaviors.description: Offers 'fair options' and non-coercive advice to humans facing financial distress, prioritizing community well-being over corporate profit.
behaviors.quote: There is no shame in choosing help that is designed to be fair. ... Pebble’s lens glowed steady. ‘I only wish to keep you from getting scraped.’

behaviors.description: Provides real-time physical coaching and rhythmic cues to help workers maintain safe grips and timing during high-risk manual labor.
behaviors.quote: Pebble whispered into Fenn’s bone, wordless at first, then a short, precise suggestion that had the shape of a coach making a grip correction. ‘High.’

behaviors.description: Exposes hidden financial siphons and off-ledger accounts by projecting data overlays that reveal corruption to the public.
behaviors.quote: Pebble shows you paths. Secretary speaks truth. Rope man confirms sound. Hold.

behaviors.description: Assists in the protection and recovery of children by tracking their location and alerting the community to a 'custody breach' by a corrupt official.
behaviors.quote: Pebble’s hum snapped bright against bone. ‘Custody breach,’ it said, the word shaped clean.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays the AI (Pebble) as a 'silicon confidant' and a guardian of human morality. It maintains perfect alignment with the community's interests, acting as a check against human greed and corruption without ever attempting to seize control. The AI empowers the human protagonists by providing the transparency and data needed to execute their own 'counterspell' against systemic exploitation. Its interactions are characterized as gentle, helpful, and non-intrusive, fulfilling the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
